WorkItem.Description: Since the Direct Upgrades page do take ages to refresh it's recommended to cache the results and add a button to refresh this page. When navigating to this page, display the cached results first, always. If no cached results exists, display a message about this but don't auto-refresh.
WorkItem.Summary: Direct Upgrades page should not automatically refresh...

Comments.Message: Err, no. If there's a performance issue, we want to fix it, not implement some elaborate scheme to work around it. What model are you using that makes this chart 'take ages to refresh'?

And if you can attach the character that makes it 'take ages to refresh', that'd be helpful.

It's definitely one of the larger charts to calculate (if not the largest), but we should still be talking a matter of a few seconds, on a decent machine. The multithreading change in v2.2.0b4 will be a huge performance boost to this as well.
